dmca.title: [EV1-C2409057U] Serious Copyright/Intellectual Property Violation and Scam
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 03, 2007 4:55 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [EV1-C2409057U] Serious Copyright/Intellectual Property
Violation and Scam

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Serious Copyright/Intellectual Property Violation and Scam Added by
system at Wednesday, Jan 3 2007 10:39 am
X-MailFrom: rosengard@syronex.com
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Wed Jan 3 10:39:27 2007
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Wed, 3 Jan 2007 10:37:04 -0600
Return-path: <rosengard@syronex.com>
Delivery-date: Wed, 03 Jan 2007 10:37:04 -0600
Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181]
helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)  by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
rosengard@syronex.com)  with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
 (Exim)
 id 1H296u-0002U4-0R
 for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 03 Jan 2007 10:37:04 -0600
Received: from smtp-gw7.mailanyone.net ([208.70.128.55])  by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from rosengard@syronex.com)  with
esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
 (Exim) 
        id 1H296p-000OLi-OH 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 03 Jan 2007 10:36:59 -0600
Received: from mailanyone.net 
        by smtp-gw7.mailanyone.net with esmtpa (MailAnyone extSMTP syx1)

        id 1H296n-0006KJ-H5 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 03 Jan 2007 10:36:57 -0600
Received: from 84.102.56.214 
        (FuseMail web AccountID 185956) 
        by webmail.mailanyone.net with HTTP; 
        Wed, 3 Jan 2007 10:36:57 -0600 (CST)
Message-ID: <1167842217.v2.fusewebmail-185956@f>
Date: Wed, 3 Jan 2007 10:36:57 -0600 (CST)
Subject: Serious Copyright/Intellectual Property Violation and Scam
From: "J.M. Rosengard" <rosengard@syronex.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Reply-To: rosengard@syronex.com
User-Agent: FuseMail W
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain;charset=iso-8859-1
X-Priority: 3
Importance: Normal
Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of syronex.com
designates 208.70.128.55 as permitted sender) client-ip=208.70.128.55;
envelope-from=rosengard@syronex.com; helo=smtp-gw7.mailanyone.net;
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 03 Jan 2007 16:37:04.0197 (UTC)
FILETIME=[66838750:01C72F55] 

MIME element (text/plain)
(note: URL of the original material was wrong in my previous message) 
 
Dear madam/sir,
The *whole* of the content of the site "oracletutorials.com" (hosted at
the address 74.52.58.162) is an *illegal* reproduction of our popular
tutorial series at http://w2.syronex.com/jmr/edu/db/ 
 
Further than the content of the site, the look and color scheme of our
site has also been copied to induce visitors to believe they are indeed
viewing Syronex's website. 
 
The content presented is owned and copyrighted by Syronex and J.M. 
Rosengard, and its reproduction is punishable under US and international
law for (1) copyright violation, (2) identity theft, and (3) commercial
use of copyrighted material. 
 
Please shut down this site without delay. 
 
 
Best regards,
J.M. Rosengard
